Title: Relates to required training for child protective services workers
Summary: Requires training in developmental disability awareness and sensitivity and cultural competency, sensitivity and implicit bias for child protective services workers.
LawCode: Amd ยง421, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring child protective services workers to receive training in developmental disability awareness and sensitivity and cultural competency, sensitivity and implicit bias
